```{r table_S2_network_module_summary, results='asis'}
table_S2 <- module_sizes %>%
    dplyr::rename(Module=module_id)

go_stats <- sapply(module_go_enrichment, nrow) %>%
    as.data.frame %>%
    rownames_to_column %>%
    setNames(c('Module', 'Num Enriched GO Terms'))
table_S2 <- merge(table_S2, go_stats, by='Module')

kegg_stats <- sapply(module_kegg_enrichment, nrow) %>%
    as.data.frame %>%
    rownames_to_column %>%
    setNames(c('Module', 'Num Enriched KEGG Pathways'))
table_S2 <- merge(table_S2, kegg_stats, by='Module')

if (CONFIG$target == 'host') {
    tf_stats <- sapply(module_coreg_enrichment, nrow) %>%
        as.data.frame %>%
        rownames_to_column %>%
        setNames(c('Module', 'Num Enriched TF Regulon Genes'))
}

if (CONFIG$target == 'pathogen') {
    table_S2 <- merge(table_S2, secreted_freqs %>% select(Module=module, `Num Secreted`=num_secreted),
                      by='Module')
    table_S2 <- merge(table_S2, membrane_freqs %>% select(Module=module, `Num Transmembrane`=num_membrane),
                      by='Module')
    table_S2 <- merge(table_S2, gpi_anchored_freqs %>% select(Module=module, `Num GPI-anchored`=num_gpi),
                      by='Module')
}

xkable(table_S2)
```
